title: Users believe Auto-Away turns the system off
source_detail: Wave 2 CSAT Survey - Reasons for not using Auto-Away **Survey Wave:** 2
quote: One user is confused about Auto-Away vs heat pump best practices: "Everything I've read about heat pumps says they should not be turned off except for long periods (>5 days). It is confusing to see a new feature that would turn off the heat pump due to lack of motion. Does it turn off when you're asleep or watching TV or sitting at a desk working? Does not seem consistent with heat pump concept messaging re: efficient use and intent."
